title: Intro to Rack Dressing: AV University 101
excerpt: Learn the basics of dressing an AV rack for clean signal flow, easy maintenance, and visual satisfaction.
content:
In this lesson, we'll go over the fundamentals of cable management, signal flow, and best practices when dressing an AV rack.

Tools You’ll Need

  • Velcro straps
  • Label printer
  • Cable comb
